website_summaries.verdict: A compact, cost-effective model by a popular brand for small to medium tasks.
pros: A little powerhouse capable of most mid-range cleanup jobs
Comes with 2 nozzles: crevice and gulper
cons: Unit is known to "throw dust" when cleaning dry areas
It's also prone to tipping during use

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after minimum use
customer_reviews.text: I had it for a few months, but only started using it in the last couple of weeks, the vacuum stopped working after 10 min of use seems like it got over heated, it is brand new and barely used, cant see a reason for it to stop so quickly especially when it is Stanley. Tried to call the customer service but no answer.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Sucks So Good
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away by lil' Stan's sucking power. After becoming a master carpenter after watching a few videos, I realized I didn't really have anything, other than a foxtail, to clean up all of this wood dust and shavings. I also realized I didn't want to spend much on a wet/dry vac. For well under $50, all I had to do was open the box, plug it in, and turn it on. I have some spare casters, so will build a rolling platform and then toss some googly eyes on it and rap some Em to my lil Stan.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Heimbuch

customer_reviews.title: It is JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Disliked everything. Stanley should be embarrassed to have their reputation associated with such an under preforming product. It is total junk, do not consider as a wet vac. Fluid blows back out of lid. What a wastes of resources. Cut off power cord to re-purpose and recycled the rest. Do Not Consider Purchasing!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this item back and October and had only used it once to vacuum my car. Recenty (today) I tried to use it to pick up a spill and the machine malfunctioned. It is not working properly. I've read the manual and tried to make it work but it is not. I wish I would've tried the wet function months ago but never had the need until now.
customer_reviews.author: Nashid Atkins

customer_reviews.title: It Really SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! What a great little vac. My son bought it for his car detailing business and he’s delighted. (So am I, he was using my cordless Dyson stick as a portable vac - grrrrrrrrrr!) Very light, portable and man does it suck. It’s a lot of motor for a small vac and it really creates some serious suction. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Margie Pargie

customer_reviews.title: Pellet stove
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine that really cleans. Great for the cars but I got a second one for my pellet stove. Of course I only use this when the pellet stove has been completely off and cooled down for hours. This really gets the job done and is just as good if not better than overpriced pellet stove vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our cars as we have a lab puppy that goes to work with my husband thus alot of dog hair accumulates in the vehicles. This vacuum is fantastic. Great suction and works perfect. Beats lugging up the huge hvac that we had. I would buy another in a heart beat. I have had it for one month and have used it at least 6 times....so far it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight, strong suction!
customer_reviews.text: Great protable size. Easy to use. No constuction to put it together. Just attach the hose when you get it out of the box and its ready to go. Lightway and has a decent lenght cord (probably still have to get an extension cord, depending what and where your using it) Very powerful. I was shocked how strong the suction is. It is a bit loud but most things like this are. Not loud to the point that makes it unusable, but you might not hear your phone ring using it. Highly Recommand!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact shop vac
customer_reviews.text: Nice little shop vac. Came in handy when I had a leak uner my kitchen sink that made a huge mess...sucked up all the water quickly and out of the neighboring carpet that got soaked...was virtually dry when I finished vacuuming. Is noisy, but is expected from a shop vac. Highly recommend. Highly recommend having, especially when storage space is at a premium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sucking product!!
customer_reviews.text: I know Stanley products to be of good quality, that and the price of this item was what really motivated me to purchase it. I have had no regrets! Taking it out of the pack it seemed a bit miniature, but it works really well. This is an excellent example of not judging something by its appearance! I haven't used it for wet spills thus far but everyone exclaims how my car is so well cleaned, this is product is one of the main reasons!
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS DIAZ

customer_reviews.title: Got it for dust collection use it for much more
customer_reviews.text: I got this to uses as a dust collection vacuum for my smaller tools and it worked as I needed. I don't need a large collection system for the amount of woodwork I do. I made a cyclone capturing unit and hoop this vac up to that and my tools and it works great. I have started using it for general use as well. I love my main Shop Vac and was hesitant to buy a small one but it is working out to be a great addition to my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Zugore

customer_reviews.title: Better than any handheld
customer_reviews.text: Omg I'm so mad in five years I've bought 3 handheld vacs. I read the ratings, spent between 80-200 and they were all terrible. This thing is PERFECT! I Vacuume my steps with all the cat hair and they look great! Not to mention the added bonus of sucking up water when the washer broke. Win win. I feel foolish for wasting money on other items.
customer_reviews.author: A satisfied person

customer_reviews.title: Great car vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of scrounging for quarters every time I needed to vacuum my car, just to get harassed by the sorts of guys that catcall women at the car wash. This was a great investment! Gets all the leaves and crumbs up with a surprisingly powerful suction. Thanks to this vacuum I may never meet the man of my dreams, but that's a price I'm willing to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: For small stuff around house this is it. Clean out Pickups. Pick up sheet rock dust, redid light switch box. Take filter off. I used it to suck water from A coil on AC because thing wasn't draining right. I suppose you could use it to suck lime out when repairing hot water heater. I got my bigger one setup and will not. Yeah go outside with whole thing to clean the filter and watch wind direction.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J OConnor

customer_reviews.title: I just got it.... but....
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, the power is decent. Cord is a bit short. However...... it puts out a lot of hot air. And the lights dim a bit when it comes on, which implies is pulling crazy electricity from the wall. Plus the "3.0 HP" rating is nonsense, as you can't pull 3hp of electricity through a residential circuit. I'm guessing the motor is inefficient and I don't expect this one to last long.
customer_reviews.author: YLD

customer_reviews.title: Easy and great price
customer_reviews.text: The price is great and the best vacuum I could ever ask for. I cleaned my outdoor mats in minutes! They almost look brand new! Upholstery and window sill is easy now!
customer_reviews.author: My Girl Friday 805

customer_reviews.title: StanleWet/Dry Vac. 2 gallon
customer_reviews.text: The day after Christmas (12/26/18) I came home from work to find my boiler pressure valves had opened up a pipe on the boiler. Luckily the water on the basement floor was not that deep (I caught it in time) but I needed a wet vac. to clean up the water. I ordered the Stanley based on the reviews. It performed as expected but the cord is a little too short, considering the amount of water and the size of my basement area that needed to be cleaned up. The cord could be somewhat longer.
customer_reviews.author: DebS

customer_reviews.title: Better for outdoor use . . .
customer_reviews.text: My opinion is that this small wet/dry vacuum is better suited for the garage or other outdoor uses. It has good suction but it is loud and although lightweight is somewhat cumbersome to move about. Be sure that you insert and use the filter(s) properly. It is very messy to clean because it doesn't use bags. I've opted to purchase another vacuum that is wall mounted, uses bags, has a longer hose and a longer extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within and hour of using it and the motor blew
customer_reviews.text: The moment this shop vac was delivered to my house I took it out of the box and used it to clean my pellet stove and then moved on to my car. The motor shut itself off - I thought it was the dust from the stove so I cleaned the filter and emptied the receptacle. When I tried to turn it on the motor made a "bzzzt" noise and that was it. Thankfully Amazon has a good return program and I am able to return and exchange this vacuum for something that works!
customer_reviews.author: kteacher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty powerful
customer_reviews.text: A mighty mite of a machine. Provides all the horsepower I needed for the jobs around the house I use it for. Kind of wish it had either wheels or a shoulder strap. Hose could be longer. I kept the box it came in because the attachments and hose don't fit well on the vacuum itself. Still, a great little shop vac.
customer_reviews.author: robotfan

customer_reviews.title: Check function on vacuuming liquids, try bucket of water outdoors before you try it on clean carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Good power for the price and easy to tote. but terrible when vacuuming liquids, it sprays out the exhaust. I was busy vacuuming and brushing and didn't see at first that dirty water was spraying out the exhaust The unit had well under a gallon vacuumed. Not sure if foam filter was on wrong and getting too saturated, or if it is better to run without filter. I will be experimenting to see if it was my error or if it just doesn't work and I need to return it. Before you try it on carpet, check function by vacuuming a bucket of clean water outside.
customer_reviews.author: Flip Phone 808

customer_reviews.title: Needed to replace - this was better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have had a small shop vac for many years, but of late it wasn't sounding, or smelling so good. This one is a bit smaller yet had a more powerful motor - that seemed like a win-win, and it has been. It takes up less space, yet is plenty powerful. The main ding - the hose is quite short. I was hoping to use other small diameter hoses I have, but they are all bigger than the one this comes with. My last one had casters, too, and this convenient, but I don't miss them as much. Longer hose and it would have gotten five stars.
customer_reviews.author: WileEC

customer_reviews.title: Extremely portable
customer_reviews.text: I have used this little vacuum mainly for classic cars and in my shop. So far is working great. I love how portable and lightweight it is. Don't know why it gets negative reviews for power because mine works extremely well. So far it has handled everything I've thrown at it. Will update my review if I have any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: p flyer

customer_reviews.title: One of my better purchases! Sucks exceedingly well
customer_reviews.text: One of my better purchases! Sucks exceedingly well. Compact design, portability, and strong motor make for ideal car vacuum. I can't stop vacuuming our cars. My daughter is so worried about my new found obsession that she has scheduled an intervention. Buy it! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: scott amato

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once, but so far I love it. I vacuumed my whole van out and it had no issues with any of the dirt and kids snacks. The little brush attachment is amazing. The suction is great. I love how little it is so it stores perfectly, but not too small to have to empty constantly. Its a good little shopvac for day to day stuff you dont want to use your regular vacuum for (like glass, cat litter, spilled food, the vehicles). I only wish I'd bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaJean

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Poweful lol machine
customer_reviews.text: Just got out of box and was reading directions, (We wen do that)! Haha. Didnt realise but it is also a mini blower, which is awesome, I just used it to blow our front porch off and it has some POWER! I will be putting it to use here in a bit cleaning out our Vechiles! The hose is not very long only about 4 foot but it will do the job, if hose was a bit longer I would of given 5 stars on all! For the price it's a nifty little machine to do what I need it to do! =)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Decent for your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strictly for wet vac application. It’s not extremely powerful but it does handle small jobs effortlessly. I use it to suck the runoff water out of my house plants and I’m very satisfied. No water came out the back like others said simply because I put the wet filter on correctly. If you have the dry filter on for wet application it will spray out of the exhaust. As for longevity I would expect to get ATLEAST 6 months to a years service out of this machine. It’s cheaply made but it’s cheaply priced also. Great for quick clean-ups
customer_reviews.author: Tommy tee

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible. Not great.
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose I wanted it for (pet clean up) but I wouldn’t recommend it for a bigger job. The hose is short and if it’s pulled at all it pops off. The cord is also very short so you have to be right next to what your cleaning up with it. I find it a little annoying to have to change plugs every few steps. Suction is pretty good. For the money it’s worth it but if your looking for something for more than a smal cleanup this probably wouldn’t work for you.
customer_reviews.author: DSW

customer_reviews.title: Worked twice, then never again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my truck, used it 2 times the first 2 weeks I had it, then put it in the box and did not take it back out until today. I know it has been awhile, but it did not work- it started then quit after about 10 seconds. I know it has been a long time, but it has been kept in a clean and dry environment. Very disappointing. And the hose and cord are both too short. 3 feet longer on each would make this perfect, if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Ken K.

customer_reviews.title: So easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to use. It's a smaller capacity tank, perfect for those quick jobs around the house, especially in tight spaces. It's extremely lightweight, so easy to hold while on a ladder. It auto shuts off when it's full. Suction is strong. Pop open and empty in mere seconds. And come-on, it's super low price...just get it. Use it to clean your car, or in your garage, or cleaning a small leak, or a clogged dishwasher. Wet or dry, easy!
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum. Very powerful. Great attachment heads. My only complaints are that I wish the cord was longer. I added an extension cord. Also it would be great if it had a strap so you could put it on your shoulder instead of having to carry it around in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mona A. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Much better for me than a ShopVac
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a secondary vac for my shop but after I tried it, I moved the ShopVac into my shop and this became my primary garage vac. So lightweight and portable, but still better suction than the ShopVac which cost a lot more. The other day I used it with a Eureka "PowerPaw" attachment to do our carpeted stairs and that's something I could never have done with the house Hoover OR the ShopVac.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Great for detail work
customer_reviews.text: I use it to blow water out of nooks and crevices after washing my motorcycle. No standing water equals no rust on fasteners.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Q

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little shop vac
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little shop vac. The blower feature is also nice for getting sanding dust out of the shop.
customer_reviews.author: Rodman Abdu

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great little vaccum which I bought to vaccum out my car. it works very good for the purpose and would reccomend it
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: got this to be able to vacuum my car, it removes pet hair just as good as the car wash vacuums, had a bit of issue with it but was able to troubleshoot so didn't have to return it. I will eventually use it for other things but for now im def love it for hair pet removal from car seats
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: This vac is a brute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly clean out my truck. And it does a great job. It has awesome power, considering the size. It works a lot better than I had expected. And the price is great as well. If you are looking for a more portable shop vac, this is the one to get. I've tried other small vacs, but this beats them every time. And yes the power cord is a little short, but it's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: This unit is powerful and handy. I used it to clean out my AC drain.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Hose is too short, too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Good suction, but the hose is too short and too stiff. The picture of the man vacuuming his car shows a longer hose. You <might> be able to buy a longer hose for another $18. They should only picture the actual equipment. With the stock hose you'll have to lift the vacuum to reach the back seat of a car. And the connection is non-standard. Disappointed in Stanley.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Unique shape.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other small shop vacs. Bought this one because of it’s unusual shape. It does not tip like the others. Has typical amounts of suction. Doubt I could tell that feature from another brand. Arrived a day ahead of shedule.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Steward

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great wet vacuum for small applications. Arrived with the wet filter under the dry filter. So remove the dry filter before use. Picks up small amounts of water very well. Have not used it for dry surfaces. For now I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: PKWOrlando

customer_reviews.title: Does not perform
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because we have a bunny and I wanted something lightweight and easy to move to pick up the stray shavings and food pellets that escape the cage. I am so disappointed in the suction power. It does not suck up even the smallest amount of shavings and the shavings are lightweight. You also have to have the hose at just the right angle and constantly lift it up to ensure that when it does suction something up it doesn't eject it back out a second later. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KLEGG

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little guy
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed about the power and lightweight aspect of it. The thing I wasn't a fan of, my laundry machine exploded with and laundry soap everywhere I used opportunity to vacuum with my Stanley and I was using it the bubbles shot out the exhaust valve on the other side. To a point where I couldn't even use the vacuum because what I was sucking up came right out the other end. Thinking about returning. Not sure the purpose of the exhaust.
customer_reviews.author: Degauld

customer_reviews.title: Needs a bag
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a vacuum the blows the stuff you vacuum up out the exhaust post back on the floor, this is the vac for you. I imagine vacuuming a car outside, this wouldn’t be an issue as it will just blow it into your driveway. A bag inside the vacuum would eliminate this but I don’t know if ones available. I ended up ordering a more expensive Dewalt vac.
customer_reviews.author: Long time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little shop vac.
customer_reviews.text: I got the 3gal, 3hp. Seen alot of negative review, but for the price, I couldn't not try it. If it was junk I would just return it. But I guess I lucked out. This thing is great. Awsome suction! I couldn't be more thrilled. And the price! Couldn't pass this up! If I get a year out of it, I got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: handy in a small shop
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a small shop vac that would not need a bag. this vac is small, handy and great for cleanups in my shop. I am thinking of getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: loucarreras

customer_reviews.title: great suction power
customer_reviews.text: This little shop vacuum is so much more powerful than my last Home Depot Husky brand vac. I am very surprised at how well this thing works. It picks up sawdust and leaves and nails and little scraps of wood. It is a vast improvement in suction power and is a little more compact, too.
customer_reviews.author: photo papa

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: works well for the job I got it for and that was to assist in getting the last of the water and junk out of my water feature. Plus have found works well for clean out the floor of my car and hubbies truck as well as lots of other little jobs when don't want to drag big vacuum out.
customer_reviews.author: rnbranch

customer_reviews.title: Good prototype needs tweaking.
customer_reviews.text: The hose is very short and stiff and trying to maneuver it inside a vehicle dumps the unit over. If it is off when that happens the dirt falls out around the lid. You are back to needing to vacuuming your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: GV Couch

customer_reviews.title: A solid 4 star product, but not 5 star
customer_reviews.text: The extension cord is super short. I wish the would’ve made it just like 3-4 feet longer. And the hose is also super short. I had to buy a hose attachment because it was just laughably short. It’s powerful though. It seems to have great suction. I detailed my car with it and it did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: look at the review.
customer_reviews.text: I'am very with my purchase its a great little vacume & great suction power.. the suction hose needs to be longer along with the power cord.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Comeaux

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction and Versatility!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine did the job. We had a clogged drainage hole in our utility room and the floor was constantly flooding. We used this wet dry vac to suck up the water until we could get a plumber to come out. It really had great suction. I’ll now use it to vacuum my SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Good suction. Very lightweight. Easy to carry but wish they had put roller wheels on it for easy maneuverability. Also cord to plug into outlet is way too short. I have to purchase an extension cord. Different attachments to choose from. Overall I’m happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Takahashi

customer_reviews.title: Great vac for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this small shop vac ! It has great suction and is easy to carry from room to room. I also use this in my car and it does wonders . I clean for a living and this takes on anything! My only concern is that the nozzle that attaches the hose to the vac comes apart if you put it on the ground and you pull even a little. It does have a nice wide base and doesn't tip over ! I reccomend this highly!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gauerke

customer_reviews.title: This little vac is not a joke!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it a lot since receiving it and it’s been very handy in clearing ice from the back of my French door fridge which has a large bottom freezer drawer. I’m not sure why ice collects behind the freezer door every few weeks, but this vac has been very helpful in making a tedious task less time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Brie In SC

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable vac around the house
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Small enough to use as portable but needs 110v. Good suction and works well when picking up liquids., bags not needed but recommend them. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Harris

customer_reviews.title: A great deal for a quality product
customer_reviews.text: We clean our cars, and the attachments are perfect ..we also use it in the garage, and in the house for any clean ups or wood craft projects.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne lee

customer_reviews.title: Powerful enough to pick up small particles. Small enough to take with you to the job site.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Good suction. Compact size. Easy to carry to or from a job site, where you have done a small repair, and want to leave the customer's premises, dust free.
customer_reviews.author: Maneki Neko

customer_reviews.title: Its worth it for its money
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad lil shop vac. did my car.. did great for my car. (that alone is what I bought it for) works really good on my stairs in my house and then also my room is over crowded with stuff I buy so getting inbetween ares use to be hard.. this is a great lil vac
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product itself is very good . I use it to vacuum my car and stairs . This really helps because I have dogs so it helps remove their fur . Anyways , just a suggestion for packaging. My product was left outside my house and luckily I was there to receive it but if I wasn’t there my neighbors could have easily seen what I had bought especially since the box had a picture of the item . I would suggest shipping it in another box to avoid having other people steal your customers package :) .luckily my item did not get stolen but others may not have the same luck .
customer_reviews.author: Alana Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, find a more durable brand.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and the case was broken in a couple days, the replacement was easy but the next one just stopped working after a couple months of light use.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Best part of this vac is the suction and amount it holds! 🤗🤗
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little vacuum out there!! It's lightweight and very convenient! I love the suction power this little unit has. The attachments it comes with are awesome too. Nice long cord and the hose is a good length. If want an in between shop vac for around the house or wherever get this one! I agree with the price too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5 Star Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This thing has PLENTY of suction! The reason for only 4 stars is that they really scrimped on the length of the vacuum hose and the power cord. It's hard to find a small vacuum with the advertised suction but this one lives up to the 3 hp rating.
customer_reviews.author: F86L Fighter Man

customer_reviews.title: Well, worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent product. The suction is amazing. This brand name is very good company products. Worth it
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bird

customer_reviews.title: Good suction
customer_reviews.text: Using this to vacuum up German Shepherd fur.....in the summer a never ending task. This gets most all of the hair up off my truck's flooring which is remarkable. I'm satisfied and feel I got a good value for my dollars.
customer_reviews.author: EJ Mangan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THIS VACUUM GET THE JOB DONE. GREAT PRICE AND FAST SHIPPING. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: SUSTO

customer_reviews.title: Bought for vacuuming car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to vacuum my dog hairs inside the car. And they do a decent job. It doesn't clear out ALL embedded dog hairs in the car, but it takes out a good majority. I wish the suction was stronger, but for the price, it's enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Small but strong
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to carry around in the shop or car and clean with good suction power
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Stanley products are quality products
customer_reviews.text: My first wet/dry vacuum, I am excited to have a vacuum with great suction & easy to move while cleaning. Of course I had to buy an extension cord for added length but it preforms just like I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Stanley used to be known for quality over a wide variety of tools and equipment. Those days appear to be over. This vac quit after a single use. I'd go with another brand of tools and equipment, were I you.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mccandless

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective, at this price
customer_reviews.text: This little vac really has the suction power! I saturated my carpet while cleaning several spots, and this vac cleaned it up so well, the carpet was dry in a couple of hours. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: CJP@satx

customer_reviews.title: Sucks the best!!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely surprised by how well this little vaccuum works!! So very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Diego Merindez

customer_reviews.title: Spot cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great product for spot cleanup on carpets or upholstery. Suction feels adequate but not the greatest but for the money, it’s a good to have product.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Little Shop Vac
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Mostly use it for vacuuming between and under furniture as we have 6 dogs. Not too big to carry while using and plenty of suction for getting hair out of carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Marius Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly and works perfect
customer_reviews.text: this wet dry vac was easy to assemble and work great. Very powerful and picks up everything . very good product. i sue it for cleaning my pellet smoker - works fantastic
customer_reviews.author: apopnj

customer_reviews.title: Great little vac!!
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum packs a might punch. Is extremely portable and light. Love it! Use it everywhere (e.g. Shop, Car interior, House, etc...). Thanks Stanley!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great!!! This is just what I was looking for! Just enough power for soaking up water in the shower and enough power to vacuum the car! The hose and the electrical cord are a little short, but a simple extension cord fixes that issue. Love how lightweight it is, makes it a breeze to carry around!
customer_reviews.author: ET38

customer_reviews.title: All you need!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is all you need for everyday cleaning. We have used this for both wet an dry with no issues. The suction power is great and makes clean-up easy. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer2015

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for in my Semi-truck!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and very powerful as well for how small it is! Stores perfectly under the bed of my semi-truck and makes keeping my floors clean in the truck so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Rob & Riki

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this vaccum. Had a big one that took up a lot of space and this outperforms the big one by far.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Sucks everything up and leaves the carpet looking like new
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is outstanding I just got it today and used it on my truck, and the suction is unbelievable. Sucks everything up and leaves the carpet looking like new. I t also go's inside my truck without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stoffal

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help keep my grow area clean. Sucked up the spilled soil with not problem. Only thing I can say is a con is I with it came with at least a two foot wand extension.
customer_reviews.author: William Bone

customer_reviews.title: Really powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how powerful this vac is. I bought it for the garage but tried it out in the house. WOW It’s still in the house. Using the attachments for my house vac, I’m vacuuming the tops of door jams, window ledges and where the carpet meets the wall.
customer_reviews.author: KAY C

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the lil bugger !
customer_reviews.text: Never owned a small shop vac like this. Always had 16 gal, vacs, I am impressed with this one and will definatly use it ad replace with same if needed in the future. Highly recomend this vac, Comes with Hose Nozzle and filters, Other Nozzles and attachments will also fit =)
customer_reviews.author: ZanPW

customer_reviews.title: It's small in size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Patio that gets a lot of leaves and grass from the mowers. Easy for me to handle. Also in case of any water overflow I can suck it up.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Vac
customer_reviews.text: I like it only wished the hose was a little longer. Very powerful small vac.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product!
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum has all the suction of a bigger model with all the maneuverability of a small unit. My husband just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: KSJ

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Just love having it. My late husband always had the larger type. This one suits me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: keenerbos

customer_reviews.title: good sucking/blowing power
customer_reviews.text: Beyond my expectation, i even used it to help drying the carpet after it's washed using a Bissell Little Green that doesn't suck water up well
customer_reviews.author: Echoecho

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great little vac, very good suction and easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Every strong vac. Use it almost every weekend after ...
customer_reviews.text: Every strong vac. Use it almost every weekend after car washed.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money very nice
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect for the little jobs I needed it for. What are you guys waiting for, go buy yourself one I promise you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Donna Shirk

customer_reviews.title: Great vac
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works great. Has attachments included which wasnt advertised so bought attachments which i had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this on amazon. It came with one attachment piece that doesn’t even fit probably and a hose that doesn’t fit probably. None of the other pieces were there. We can’t even use it and amazon wants to charge us 8 dollars to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Just awful
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had worked better. I like the size but the tubes are super small and the motor amazingly weak. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha A.Top Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Suction is middle of the road not terrible and not great. I bought it to suck up aluminum shavings from mill and it does.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly stopped working it's 3rd time in use
customer_reviews.text: Amazon was kind enough to refund so long as we send it back. It was so perfect until it just stopped working!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Stanley Wet/Dry Vacuum 3 Gallon 3 Horsepower  (Small But Mighty) Get's the job done!
customer_reviews.text: We love this Stanley Wet/Dry Vacuum 3 Gallon 3 Horsepower It is Small But Mighty!! Make No Mistake This unit will get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hose

customer_reviews.title: Showed up broken
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get to use it because it was broken out of the box and the manufacture has not called me back about the parts. We tried it on every outlet in our house and it just doesn't turn on. Not sure how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shop Vac
customer_reviews.text: Great little shopvac - only negative is the fact the hose diameter is smaller then the one we were replacing so it seems to get clogged more.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Wilson
